title: For3ver
description: When it came to her lifelong friendship to the Porter boys, Ryley Reynolds knew one thing to be true: The 3 of them would be friends forever. Friends 'till the end.  When life got in the way of their plans, one decision changed the course of all of their lives.  Five years later, friends are brought back together, secrets are unveiled, and love is found again. Has too much damage been done to erase the past?  **18+ due to language and explicit material**
author: M. Piper
